projects.title: Portfolio Interativo
projects.description: Meu portfolio pessoal em estilo desktop com terminal, jogos e apps funcionais
projects.fullDescription: Desenvolvi este portfolio como um sistema operacional completo que roda no navegador. A ideia era criar algo diferente e mostrar que sei fazer mais do que sites estáticos. Construí um gerenciador de janelas do zero, com arrastar, redimensionar e snap nas bordas. O terminal aceita mais de 25 comandos com autocompletar e histórico. Fiz 11 jogos em canvas (Snake, Tetris, Pong, etc), uma calculadora com modo científico e programador, player de música e muito mais. São mais de 10.000 linhas de JavaScript puro, sem frameworks, organizadas em módulos. O resultado é uma experiência interativa que mostra na prática minhas habilidades como desenvolvedor fullstack.

projects.title: E-commerce Platform
projects.description: Full-stack online store with cart, payments, and admin dashboard
projects.fullDescription: A complete e-commerce solution featuring product catalog, shopping cart, secure payment integration, user authentication, and a comprehensive admin dashboard for inventory management.

projects.title: Task Manager API
projects.description: RESTful API for task management with authentication
projects.fullDescription: A robust RESTful API for task and project management. Features JWT authentication, role-based permissions, task assignments, due dates, and real-time notifications via WebSockets.

projects.title: Weather Dashboard
projects.description: Real-time weather app with forecasts and location search
projects.fullDescription: A beautiful weather dashboard that displays current conditions, hourly and weekly forecasts. Features location search, geolocation support, and dynamic backgrounds based on weather conditions.

projects.title: Chat Application
projects.description: Real-time messaging app with rooms and file sharing
projects.fullDescription: A real-time chat application supporting multiple rooms, private messaging, file sharing, emoji reactions, and message history. Built with WebSocket for instant communication.

projects.title: Fitness Tracker
projects.description: Mobile-first app for tracking workouts and nutrition
projects.fullDescription: A comprehensive fitness tracking application for logging workouts, tracking nutrition, setting goals, and visualizing progress with charts. Features a mobile-first responsive design.
